images.copyright: Brown-throated three-toed sloth in Manuel Antonio National Park, Costa Rica (© Lukas Kovarik/Shutterstock)
images.title: Feeling lazy? Today's your day.
images.caption: Feeling lazy? Today's your day.
images.desc: Isn't it odd that many of us don't have to work on Labor Day, but International Sloth Day is just another Wednesday? If you're moving slowly today, that's just fine: You're outpacing today's homepage subject, which spends 90% of its time scarcely moving a muscle.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
tooltips.walls: Download this image. Use of this image is restricted to wallpaper only.
